item.description:

item.title: [UPDATED] Google Patches Eighth Chrome Zero-Day of 2025 Under Active Attack
item.description:
Google has released an emergency, out-of-band security update for its Chrome browser, patching its eighth zero-day vulnerability of 2025. The high-severity flaw, tracked as issue 466192044, is confirmed to be actively exploited in the wild. To prevent further abuse, Google has withheld technical det...
